participant_1.name: Samantha
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and dedicated, Samantha enjoys spending her weekends dancing and competing with her dogs. She's practical and down-to-earth, showing little interest in fashion trends.
participant_1.background: i dance on the weekends. i compete in dog agility classes. i don't care about fashion. i hate the color orange. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore.

participant_2.name: Leonardo
participant_2.personality: Creative and outgoing, Leonardo thrives in artistic environments and has a strong sense of heritage. His adventurous spirit is shown through his frequent travels to Europe.
participant_2.background: i'm a descendant of christopher columbus. i'm an art major in college. i have a weakness for fish and chips. i visit europe twice a year.

content.text: Nice to see you :hug: how’s everything?
